name: Match Maker - The Sock Matching Game
name_original: Match Maker - The Sock Matching Game
description:
This game was created for the Global Game Jam 2020.

The theme was "Repaired," so naturally we made a game about re-pairing socks!

Our team consisted of:

  • Cory Beutler - Programming and a few 2D assets
  • Dallin Beutler - Programming
  • Neal Finger - 2D assets, 3D models, Rigging and Animating
  • Will Whiteneck - Programming, a few 2D assets, and video editing

It starts out so simple, but like all things, it get a lot more complicated...
